Body:
s = spectrographs.magellan_fire.MagellanFIREEchelleSpectrograph()
example_file = os.path.join(os.environ['PYPEIT_DEV'], 'RAW_DATA',
    'magellan_fire', 'FIRE_Echelle', 'fire_0048.fits')
assert os.path.isfile(example_file
    ), 'Could not find example file for MagellanFire Echelle read.'
det = 1
_, data, hdu, exptime, rawdatasec_img, oscansec_img = s.get_rawimage(
    example_file, det)
bpm = s.bpm(example_file, det)
assert data.shape == (2048, 2048)
assert bpm.shape == (2040, 2040)
dev_suite_required
